author: leolara
content: is it ok to post here jobs for backend engineers that want a paid ethereum protocol job? as  done up there by timbeiko?

author: timbeiko
content: I would rather we avoid turning this discord into a job board. I posted the above as an illustration that client teams _do_ hire people, but didn't mean it as an advertisement of those specific jobs. <@364458974906548225> could we use the CDAP repos Issues section for something like that?
